author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED  ACROSS THE CAYMAN ISLANDS OVERNIGHT...
summary:
...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED  ACROSS THE CAYMAN ISLANDS OVERNIGHT...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Thu Jul 4
 the center of Beryl was located near 18.3, -80.1
 with movement WNW at 21 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 965 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.
